trans-unit.source: Runs the code-beside method associated with an activity.
trans-unit.target: Executa o método code-beside associado a uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Code-beside methods invoked by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> are executed in a synchronous manner; <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> does not yield its thread until the thread is finished.
trans-unit.target: Ao lado do código os métodos invocados por <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> são executadas de forma síncrona; <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> não gera seu thread até que o thread é concluído.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the execution of the code-beside method is expected to be performed and should not block with a dependency on some external resource.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a execução do método ao lado do código é esperada para ser executada e não deve bloquear com uma dependência em algum recurso externo.

trans-unit.source: For example, the code-beside method should typically not invoke a Web service.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o método ao lado do código deve normalmente não invocar um serviço da Web.

trans-unit.source: The typical use of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> is to examine workflow instance state, and change local variables and messages.
trans-unit.target: O uso típico de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> é examinar o estado da instância de fluxo de trabalho e alterar as variáveis locais e mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example code also creates new instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> classes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código também cria novas instâncias de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> classes.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs ConditionedActivityGroup SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [ConditionedActivityGroup usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity" /> inicia.

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode> event.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode> evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Compensation SDK sample from the PurchaseOrder.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrder.cs SDK de compensação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Compensation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [compensação usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que destina-se ao evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> and specify the handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> e especificar o manipulador para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity.ExecuteCode> evento.
